name: Apple Clicker (crashingintogames)
description:
Press S to Save Press L to Load

All songs used in this game are a piano remix of an actual song, here they are as follows: -What is my life (Schmoyoho) -I'm Just a Kid

(Simple Plan) -Let it be (The Beatles) -Untitled (Simple Plan) -Enclosure (Metal Gear Solid)

 -DBH theme (Peter Berring)

 -Into Sunset (Alexey Omelchuk)

 -Gusty Garden Galaxy (Mahito Yokota)

 -Secunda (Skyrim)

 -Mice on Venus (C418)

 -Heavy Price Paid (Martin O Donnel)

 -Hey Soul Sister (Train) -Let Her Go (Passenger) -Pompeii (Bastille)
